txt.en:
'Muaha-muahahaha, Muahahahaa, MUAHAHAHAHAAAAA!

Oh dear! Sorry if I've frightened you, I'm working on improving my laugh.

Advice? Yes, well, as the villain you are expected to be scheming, conniving; a monster in the truest sense of the word. Try not to act too nice... the audience hates when I do that.'
Do you have any advice for me?
